name: Infinite Chili Sauce  无尽的辣酱
description: Casual and relaxed placement game, hang your time in your leisure time and build your own chili sauce empire.
minimum_requirements: OS: win7 Processor: i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: nvidia Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: win10 Processor: i7 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: nvidia Storage: 100 MB available space
